alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, western Jefferson, Leon, northeastern Franklin, southern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midway to 10 miles southwest of Tallahassee Comm College to 8 miles southwest of Crawfordville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs, Florence, Medart, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
